tasks.task: Following biosecurity guidelines when transporting livestock.
subtasks: Identify designated secure entry points for empty trucks.
Contact farmer or rancher for admittance and necessary phone numbers.
Allow vehicles to be inspected before entering premises.
Clean or direct truck/trailer if mud or manure is present.
Sign entry log and provide contact information and equipment condition.
Follow specified routes during transportation.
Examine required paperwork before loading animals (e.g., CVI, brand certificate, bill of lading, bill of sale).
Ensure clean outs are closed and bedding is fresh before loading.
Examine animals for health before loading and remove sick/injured animals.
Double-check paperwork and ensure gates are closed upon completing loading.
Log departure time and any other necessary information.

tasks.task: Admit and handle transportation procedures at the receiving facility.
subtasks: Call ahead for admittance and follow specified entry procedures.
Follow routes given by facility staff.
Sign in and provide required information upon arrival.
Examine incoming animals' paperwork (CVI, brand certificate, bill of lading, bill of sale) upon arrival.
Verify and document animal numbers and classes.
Isolate sick animals as soon as possible during unloading.
Hoose down or clean transportation equipment once unloaded, if possible, to prevent further contamination.

Performing livestock clean-out and transportation sanitation.
subtasks: Ensuring trailers are clean before transporting animals.
Checking and closing cleanout covers on trailers during loading.
Applying fresh bedding material (e.g., straw, wood shavings) to trailers before loading.
Loading clean-out areas on received transportation equipment.
Thoroughly cleaning trucks/trailers at the end of the transport journey, including exterior and interior surfaces, and applying disinfectants.
Walking through designated entry and exit points at the farm/ranch.
Manual inspection of facilities and loading zones at pick-up and delivery.

tasks.task: Adhering to health and sanitation protocols during livestock transport.
subtasks: Changing into clean footwear and clothing when handling animals.

tasks.task: Performing livestock transport while adhering to biosecurity guidelines.
subtasks: Drives to and from the farm (though this might not be explicitly a physical task as much as job-related.)

tasks.task: Conducting livestock transport with biosecurity measures.
